entry.title: Combined summary - Snowstorm
entry.summary: The sender of this message is currently experiencing a lack of power, which may result in a delay of their ability to assist with verifying gitian builds or pulling patches. It is unclear what has caused the loss of power or where the sender is located. However, it is possible that they are unable to access reliable internet or other resources due to this issue. The message was sent from an iPhone, indicating that the sender may be relying on cellular data to communicate. Until power is restored, it may be difficult for the sender to provide timely assistance.
